# Competitor Research Template

Use this template when researching each competitor.

## Basic Info

```markdown
## [Competitor Name]

**URL**:
**Type**: Direct / Indirect / Adjacent / Emerging
**Category**: OSS / Commercial / Freemium

### One-Line Summary
[What it is in one sentence]

### Target Users
[Who is it for?]

### Pricing
[Free / Freemium / Paid - details]
```

## Feature Analysis

```markdown
### Core Features
- [ ] [Feature 1] - [brief description]
- [ ] [Feature 2] - [brief description]
- [ ] [Feature 3] - [brief description]

### Notable Capabilities
[What do they do particularly well?]

### Missing/Weak Areas
[What's notably absent or poorly done?]
```

## Technical Analysis (if applicable)

```markdown
### Technical Approach
- **Architecture**: [monolith/microservices/serverless/etc]
- **Stack**: [languages, frameworks, infrastructure]
- **Open Source?**: Yes/No/Partial

### Technical Strengths
[What's technically impressive?]

### Technical Limitations
[Known technical issues or constraints?]
```

## User Perception

```markdown
### What Users Like (from reviews, forums, etc)
- [Praise point 1]
- [Praise point 2]

### What Users Dislike
- [Complaint 1]
- [Complaint 2]

### Common Use Cases
[How do people actually use it?]
```

## Market Position

```markdown
### Momentum
- **Growth**: Growing / Stable / Declining
- **Community**: [size, activity level]
- **Updates**: [frequency, recency]

### Market Share / Adoption
[Any available data on usage, downloads, customers]

### Funding/Backing (if commercial)
[Investment, company size, sustainability]
```

## Comparison to Us

```markdown
### Where They're Ahead
| Area | Their Advantage | Gap Severity |
|------|-----------------|--------------|
| [Area] | [What they do better] | Critical/Moderate/Minor |

### Where We're Ahead
| Area | Our Advantage | Defensibility |
|------|---------------|---------------|
| [Area] | [What we do better] | High/Medium/Low |

### Key Differentiators
[What makes us fundamentally different, not just feature differences]
```

## Strategic Notes

```markdown
### Threat Assessment
- **Likelihood of user switching to them**: High/Med/Low
- **Likelihood of them copying our advantages**: High/Med/Low

### What We Could Learn
[Good ideas worth borrowing or adapting]

### What We Should NOT Copy
[Things they do that don't fit our approach]
```

## Research Sources

```markdown
### Sources Used
- [URL] - [what it provided]
- [URL] - [what it provided]

### Research Date
[Date this research was conducted - for freshness tracking]
```
